resources.string: "Click on top right + to add a list
You can import a list or chose its storage folder by clicking on "more option" in the list creation window
Switch lists by clicking on them
Long click a list to move it or show its options (edit / delete)
Add an item to the selected list with the top "Add" text box
Swipe an item left to delete it
Swipe an item right to edit it
💡 Quickly add a comment by clicking the "⌄" button appearing under the "Add" edit box when you start typing !
Show an item comments by clicking on the "⌄" button at the end of the line --->
And as undone by clicking on it again !
Mark item as done simply by clicking on it
Access the settings from the ⚙ button at the top of the screen
